sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Online Child Safety Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Online Child Safety Act.

sections.heading: Legislative intent. It is the intent of the General Assembly that this Act promote the dissemination of qualifying parental controls for the protection of children in this State subject to appropriate and beneficial oversight by their parents and families
sections.text: Legislative intent. It is the intent of the General Assembly that this Act promote the dissemination of qualifying parental controls for the protection of children in this State subject to appropriate and beneficial oversight by their parents and families.

sections.heading: Applicability. This Act applies to every Internet access provider that knows or has reason to know that a subscriber currently resides in this State.
sections.text: Applicability. This Act applies to every Internet access provider that knows or has reason to know that a subscriber currently resides in this State.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
